dc:title: The Apostolate of Letter Writing
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Discusses the major importance at the C.W. of letter writing, which needs to be joined with prayer. Gives a summary of the letters she needs to answer, ranging from defending the attacks on her position to thanking the praise she receives from her position.
